page.title: 13EDUCATION - CAROLYN'S DAY
page.content: A day in the life of Carolyn. I start the day at seven o'clock when I go downstairs to get dressed. My dad gets breakfast and then I brush my teeth, comb my hair and get my coat and bag. Sometimes my dad goes to work early so I have to stay at my Nana's house. There I watch the television until it is time to go to school. When the whistle goes I go to my classroom and take out my 7-a-day book which has sums inside it. It is good, we also have sums on the blackboard.Then we go to assembly after which we do English until playtime and continue doing similar work until 12 o'clock. We finish dinner as 12:30 and then play. In the afternoon we have more lessons with stories and games. Put up chairs and go home. I walk home with Trisha. We play out until its time to go in.
